short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Slected chrome extension is an easy way to find people of similar career path or interest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Slected chrome extension is an easy way to find people of similar career path or interest. With this tool you can at a click of button know what common interest you have with the other person professionally

Slected chrome extension is a tool that enables you to quickly find out how similar you are with someone else on LinkedIn. The tool compares the information provided in the profile from Experience, Education to Skills. You will be provided with a Similarity percentage, which you can find whenever you visit someone else's LinkedIn profile. The score is available next to the Name. 

Not just similarity percentage, you are also presented with an easy to understand visualisation of the comparison. 
You as user of Slected tool have to signup, do not worry we do not store information or  profiles you have visited.
